title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5019.1 - Additional definitions as used in this Part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5019.1 - Additional definitions as used in this Part

State Regulations
(a) Records
shall mean any
information kept, held, filed, produced or reproduced by, with or for the
system. (b) Records access
officer
shall mean the system's officer or his or her authorized
designee, responsible for public information and compliance with the Freedom of

Information Law and the Personal Privacy Protection Law. (c) Records appeals officer
shall mean the system's Managing Director of Operations or his or her
authorized designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5019.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
